DeductionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

DeductionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

DeductionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: ID of the External Payroll Deduction. Specify either the WID or "Deduction_Code=12345".

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Name of the External Payroll Deduction.
Code of the External Payroll Deduction, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Deduction for the reference ID type Deduction_Code.
A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.
If true, the External Payroll Deduction is position-based.

Calculation_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Calculation_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Calculation_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: ID of the Calculation Category. The value is always Outbound Payroll Interface.

Pay_Component_Group__All_Object.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Pay_Component_Group__All_ObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Pay_Component_Group__All_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify the Pay Component Group when the External Payroll Deduction is related to benefit plans; this is used as the benefit tag. ID of the Pay Component Group. Specify either the WID or "Pay_Component_Group_Code=12345".

Pay_Component_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Pay_Component_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Pay_Component_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify the Pay Component Group on all related pay components, such as earnings and deductions, when reporting on external payroll results from the External Payroll Results Inbound template. ID of the Pay Component Group. Specify either the WID or "Pay_Component_Group_Code=12345".

Pay_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Pay_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Pay_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group(s) for which the External Payroll Deduction is relevant. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".

FrequencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

FrequencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

FrequencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify the Frequency when the External Payroll Deduction frequency differs from the pay group frequency for each employee. ID of Override Frequency. Specify either the WID or "Frequency_ID=12345".

Payroll_Input_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payroll_Input_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Payroll_Input_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: ID of the Allowed Payroll Input Type(s). Specify either the WID or "Payroll_Input_Type_Id=12345". Allowed Payroll Input Types include Adjustment, Goal Amount, Input, and Ongoing.

Benefit_PlanObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Benefit_PlanObjectID.type: WID,  Additional_Benefits_Plan_ID,  Benefit_Plan_ID,  Defined_Contribution_Plan_ID,  Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID,  Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID,  Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID,  Spending_Account_Plan_ID
Benefit_PlanObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Benefit_PlanObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify Benefit Plans when the External Payroll Deduction applies to a benefit plan. Specify either the WID or the relevant Reference ID. Examples: Additional_Benefits_Plan_ID, Defined_Contribution_Plan_ID, Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID, Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID, Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID, Spending_Account_Plan_ID.

Absence_Component_Related_Calculation__A.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify the Time Off instance when the External Payroll Deduction is for paid time off. Specify either the WID or "Absence_Component_Related_Calculation_ID=12345".

Component_Scheduling_Data.description: The order of the criteria used for scheduling.

Calculation_Add_or_Reference.description: If true, the Calculation is Workday-delivered.

Calculation_Reference_Data.description: The reference ID of the Calculation.
The reference ID type of the Calculation. Examples: Value Comparison Calculation ID, Logic Calculation ID, Instance Value Calculation ID, Instance Set Comparison Calculation ID.

Calculation_Add_or_Reference.description: Contains the Reference ID Type and Reference ID of the Calculation.

Boolean_Calculation_Add_or_Reference.description: Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.

validation.validation: The Calculation (Workday Owned) does not exist.

Component_Scheduling_Data.description: Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.

validation.validation: The calculation type is not a boolean calculation type or the existing calculation is not returning boolean.

External_Payroll_Deduction_Extended_Data.description: Specify Scheduling when the External Payroll Deduction has a different frequency than the pay group frequency. Contains pay component scheduling data.
If true, the web service excludes the External Payroll Deduction from outbound Payroll Interface integrations.
Comments regarding the External Payroll Deduction.

description: Contains the External Payroll Deduction data.

validation.validation: If Deduction is associated with a Benefit Plan, it cannot also be associated with a Time Off.

validation.validation: If Deduction is associated with a Time Off, it cannot also be associated with a Benefit Plan.

validation.validation: The external deduction cannot be position based because multiple jobs are not enabled in this tenant.
validation.description: The external deduction cannot be position based because multiple jobs are not enabled in this tenant.

validation.validation: The external deduction cannot be position based because it is used for benefits plans.  External deductions tagged with Employee Cost (post-tax), 2010$53, Employee Cost (pre-tax), 2010$52, Employer Cost, 2010$54, or Percent Deduction, 2010$59 are used for benefits plans.
validation.description: The external deduction cannot be position based because it is used for benefits plans.  External deductions tagged with Employee Cost (post-tax), 2010$53, Employee Cost (pre-tax), 2010$52, Employer Cost, 2010$54, or Percent Deduction, 2010$59 are used for benefits plans.

validation.validation: Pay Component Group should be of type Inbound Payroll Interface
validation.description: Pay Component Group should be of type Inbound Payroll Interface

validation.validation: Payroll Input Type: can only select Adjustment when the Deduction is associated with a Time Off or Benefit Plan.

validation.validation: Payroll Input Type: Goal Amount can not be selected on its own.  Must contain at least Input and/or Adjustment.
